text: wkdhlk la 'iithm ealaa aladhin 'iidha ma jawwk yatlubun 'ana teynhm bhmlhm 'iilaa aljhad qult lhm: la 'ajid ma 'ahmilukum ealayh min aldwabbi, fansrfu enk, waqad fadt 'aeyunuhum dameana asfana ealaa ma fatihim min sharaf aljhad wthwabh; li'anahum lm yajiduu ma ynfqwn, wama yhmlhm law kharajuu lljhad fi sabil allh
